core.errors#

Custom exceptions for data_handling.

exception data_handling.core.errors.ConfigValidationError(message: str, details: Any | None = None)#

Bases: DataHandlingError

Raised when the Hydra configuration fails validation.

details: Any | None = None#
message: str#
exception data_handling.core.errors.DataHandlingError#

Bases: Exception

Base exception for data_handling errors.

exception data_handling.core.errors.DomainError(domain: str, message: str)#

Bases: DataHandlingError

Base exception for domain-related errors.

domain: str#
message: str#
exception data_handling.core.errors.DomainExecutionError(domain: str, message: str)#

Bases: DomainError

Raised when a domain fails during execution.

exception data_handling.core.errors.DomainInterfaceError(domain: str, message: str)#

Bases: DomainError

Raised when a domain does not expose the expected interface.

exception data_handling.core.errors.DomainNotFoundError(domain: str, message: str)#

Bases: DomainError

Raised when a domain module cannot be imported.

exception data_handling.core.errors.IOConfigError(message: str, path: str | None = None, file_format: str | None = None)#

Bases: IOErrorBase

Raised when IO configuration is invalid.
